mainPage.subGreeting: A 15-year-old programmer from Germany creating games, web apps, and tools to learn new things and share ideas.

discord.head: My Discord Community
discord.text: Welcome to the official Orosemo Discord, my community hub. Here you can connect with others, get early access to updates, and exchange knowledge with other like minded. Youâ€™ll also find community channels for chatting, collaborating, and showcasing your own creations. Everyone is warmly invited to join the server and engage with the community!
